title: Gnocchi with halibut roe, peas and broad beans
description: A springtime take on gnocchi with new potato broth, young peas, broad beans and flowering herbs.
ingredients: 300g/10½oz new potatoes, preferably aura, thinly sliced
90g/3¼oz “00” pasta flour, with a little extra for dusting
400g/14oz halibut roe, trimmed and membrain removed
handful flowering herbs (such as chervil, chives, wild garlic), to serve
